results.content: Thanks for the great course. It's so helpful that you took us with you through the whole experience of building a website to see and hear your thought processes about all the little points that have to come together to make the whole. The only improvement I would suggest would be to add more info on branding for the portfolio site, picking a logo, typography, color scheme, and style that we should carry across all social media and everything we print or do for work as a developer.
